Package de.oth.blocklib.disasters.triggers

Class ScheduleDisasterTrigger

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.triggers.ScheduleDisasterTrigger
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisasterTrigger
public class ScheduleDisasterTrigger
extends java.lang.Object
implements DisasterTrigger
An easy implementation of a DisasterTrigger. It starts Disasters according to a schedule. To utilize it, a new ScheduleDisasterTrigger has to be created and has to be set as the DisasterTrigger of the Context.
Author:
Tobias Mueller
